original_text: So all the cities which ye shall give to the Levites shall be forty and eight cities: them shall ye give with their suburbs.
korean_text: 너희가 레위인에게 모두 사십팔 성읍을 주고 그 초장도 함께 주되

sentences.original_text: So all the cities which ye shall give to the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희가 레위 사람들에게 줄 모든 도시는

sentences.original_text: shall be forty and eight cities:
